info.name: Fimfiction.net header image tweaks
info.description:
Tweaks fimfiction's header so as to make it scrollable.

On mobile firefox, overflow:hidden is scrollable; on dektop browsers, you'll need to set Display Scrollbar to Yes
info.additionalInfo: Note that this changes the positioning rules for the site logo. Where it was before set to display 500PX left of center, it now displays 40px right of viewport edge
